name: John Doe
title: Relic Is Teasing Something on its Twitch Channel
body: There is something going on over on Relic Entertainments twitch channel. The developer seems to be broadcasting a map of the Mediterranean Sea shown from high above,  is stylized in a way that gives off early 20th Century vibes. There is one franchise in the studios history that definitely aligns with this most closely, but just to be thorough, lets explore all the possibilities.

name: Ali Ahmed
title: England lockdown rules to end on 19 July, PM confirms
body: England will move to the final stage of easing Covid restrictions on 19 July, ministers have confirmed. It means almost all legal restrictions on social contact will removed. But the prime minister said it was vital to proceed with caution, warning this pandemic is not over . The peak of the current wave is not expected before mid-August could lead to between 1,000 and 2,000 hospital admissions per day, according to government scientists.
